translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

At this moment, one o'clock in the night, Captain Fileno arrives and says that the enemy will be at this place at dawn today; therefore it is incumbent upon Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Secretariat of War Affairs Caçapava, March 21, 1840 Most Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. (a) Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Presidency of the Republic Secretariat To the citizen Colonel João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division. Wherever he may be.

Attached to this document was the letter dated March 20, 1840 from Captain Fileno de Oliveira Santos to Maximiano Rodrigues Fernandes.
